product_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: C | RESIN PLANT, RISHRA; C2 | FOAM WATER SPRAY SYSTEM
C | RESIN PLANT, RISHRA; C2 | FOAM WATER SPRAY SYSTEM
product_entries.full_product_description: Supply of AR-AFFF(3%) foam concentrate(PFOS/PFAS free) having sp. Gravity 1.0±.02 g/mlat 20⁰C  , PH 7.0-8.5 & viscosity 1200 ±300 cps.
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: concentration: 3%, pfos/pfas: free, specific gravity: 1.0±.02 g/ml at 20⁰C, ph: 7.0-8.5, viscosity: 1200 ±300 cps

product_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: C | RESIN PLANT, RISHRA; C2 | FOAM WATER SPRAY SYSTEM
product_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection, testing and commissioning of GI "C" Class(Heavy Class)  pipes conforming to IS 1239 with threaded or grooved fittings with  including cutting  pipes to correct lengths, providing fittings like elbow,tee,reducer and welding flanges to pipe, fixing with clamps to MS brackets / hangers, steel supports as per drawing.  Rate shall be inclusive of Zinc chromate primer over that 2 coats red enamel paint as per Fire authorities requirement over all above ground pies. Rates to be inclusive of  all complete as per specifications | 150 NB
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: class: c class (heavy class), standard: indian standard 1239, fittings: threaded or grooved, fittings included: elbow, tee, reducer, welding flanges, fixing: clamps to ms brackets/hangers, steel supports, primer: zinc chromate, paint: 2 coats red enamel, application: above ground pipes, compliance: fire authorities requirement

product_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: C | RESIN PLANT, RISHRA; C2 | FOAM WATER SPRAY SYSTEM
product_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection, fabrication, testing of MS black steel pipe Heavy grade of thickness 5.4mm conforming to IS : 1239 Part -1 including all fittings viz. Elbows, tees, flanges, etc. reduces clamps, MS support dash fasteners etc. including painting the pipe with two coats of approved red oxide primer and two coats of approved red enamel paint. Pipe joints shall be with grooved coupling. All escavation, pedestal supports, structural supports shall be of vendor's scope. | 150 mm NB
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: grade: heavy, thickness: 5.4mm, standard: indian standard 1239 part-1, fittings included: elbows, tees, flanges, reducers, clamps, ms support dash fasteners, painting: 2 coats red oxide primer, 2 coats red enamel paint, joint type: grooved coupling, excavation: included, pedestal supports: included, structural supports: included

product_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: C | RESIN PLANT, RISHRA; C2 | FOAM WATER SPRAY SYSTEM
product_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection, testing & commissioning of  Air Buffer tank complete with necessary components. The compressor shall be of capacity 15 M³/Hr( FAD), discharge pressure 10 bar, single stage, reciprocating type.
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: discharge pressure: 10 bar, compressor type: single stage, reciprocating, components: necessary components included

original_rows.1: Supply of AR-AFFF(3%) foam concentrate(PFOS/PFAS free) having sp. Gravity 1.0±.02 g/mlat 20⁰C  , PH 7.0-8.5 & viscosity 1200 ±300 cps.

Supply, erection, testing and commissioning of GI "C" Class(Heavy Class)  pipes conforming to IS 1239 with threaded or grooved fittings with  including cutting  pipes to correct lengths, providing fittings like elbow,tee,reducer and welding flanges to pipe, fixing with clamps to MS brackets / hangers, steel supports as per drawing.  Rate shall be inclusive of Zinc chromate primer over that 2 coats red enamel paint as per Fire authorities requirement over all above ground pies. Rates to be inclusive of  all complete as per specifications

Supply, erection, fabrication, testing of MS black steel pipe Heavy grade of thickness 5.4mm conforming to IS : 1239 Part -1 including all fittings viz. Elbows, tees, flanges, etc. reduces clamps, MS support dash fasteners etc. including painting the pipe with two coats of approved red oxide primer and two coats of approved red enamel paint. Pipe joints shall be with grooved coupling. All escavation, pedestal supports, structural supports shall be of vendor's scope.

Supply, erection, testing & commissioning of  Air Buffer tank complete with necessary components. The compressor shall be of capacity 15 M³/Hr( FAD), discharge pressure 10 bar, single stage, reciprocating type.

Supply, erection, fabrication, testing of MS black steel pipe Heavy grade of thickness 5.4mm conforming to IS : 1239 Part -1 including all fittings viz. Elbows, tees, flanges, etc. reduces clamps, MS support dash fasteners etc. including painting the pipe with two coats of approved red oxide primer and two coats of approved red enamel paint. Pipe joints shall be with grooved couplings. All necessary supports shall be of vendor's scope.
Supply,Installation of Butterfly valve as per BS :5155 (Wafer type) matching flanges complete with nuts & bolts.. Necessary fittings shall be provided by erection vendor.
